I possess solid hands-on experience in frontend microservices, component libraries, and automation engineering tools, excel at cross-department collaboration and team growth management, and continuously improve project delivery quality and development efficiency through innovation.

achievements.title: Monorepo Architecture Refactoring
achievements.situation: System capability and evolution were slow: current OA was a large monolithic application with OMS/ECOMS/KMG variants, code coupling led to low iteration efficiency, high maintenance costs, and low CI/CD efficiency (8 minutes per build).
achievements.task: Refactor system architecture to improve module independence and reusability, supporting rapid iteration of each product line.
achievements.action: Carefully designed three-phase split plan: 1) Initialized Monorepo with pnpm+Turborepo, separated OMS code to packages/oms, extracted shared code to shared-core and shared-legacy-ui; 2) Created oms-next with modern tech stack (React 18/AntD 5), configured micro-frontend integration with old oms; 3) Gradually rewrote old features based on slimfit component library by module.
achievements.result: Average project build time reduced by 50%, product lines can iterate and release independently, shared module changes automatically sync to dependent projects, reducing maintenance costs.

achievements.title: Micro-frontend Progressive Migration

achievements.action: Evaluated and adopted qiankun micro-frontend framework (compared with MF and internal solutions), configured oms-next as main app and old oms as sub-app; designed routing integration and gradual module/page replacement strategy; built main-sub app communication mechanism ensuring cross-app data consistency; designed comprehensive test cases to verify new-old system integration stability.
achievements.result: Successfully achieved progressive migration, system performance improved by 40% after new architecture launch, frontend development efficiency increased by 30%.

achievements.title: Technical Debt Cleanup
achievements.situation: System had long history with accumulated technical debt: multiple component library versions coexisting, Class and functional components mixed, two versions of permission check functions, numerous conditional statements, leading to high maintenance costs and slow feature iteration.
achievements.task: Systematically clean up technical debt to improve code quality and maintainability.
achievements.action: Used structured methods to manage variant differences (based on .env and config.ts instead of if/else conditionals); extracted complex business logic to shared packages (shared-core/shared-legacy-ui); unified to Slimfit component library; upgraded permission check system to support data permission points and role judgment; wrote automated code conversion scripts for batch refactoring of legacy code.
achievements.result: Code repository size reduced by 30%, component call consistency improved by 90%, permission logic errors reduced by 85%, development team's time for understanding and modifying permission-related code reduced by 70%.
